title: Windward (Cumulative Update to v2015-06-22.0)
description:
== Version:
Cumulative Steam update to v2015-06-22.0 released on June 22, 2015
Required: Any version from v2015-05-24.0 to v2015-06-17.0


== Version changes:
2015-06-19 - Now Live
Players now require 50-350 talent points to control AI (depends on the AIÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s boss tier).
Added /set kingRequirement = # where # is how many players are needed for a king to spawn. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 11 by default. It replaces the /set pirateKing = true setting.
Private profiles should no longer prevent turtle ship unlocks.


== Instructions: 
Start the update and select your game folder to update.
Play
